trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un controllo editor che consente agli utenti finali di modificare diverse proprietà dell'interfaccia utente in un oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the behavior of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe BehaviorEditorPart è un controllo editor che deriva dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>e viene utilizzata per modificare le proprietà che influiscono sul comportamento di un oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: Oltre alle aree di strumento in set di controlli Web part (per informazioni dettagliate, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>Cenni preliminari sulla classe), sono disponibili i controlli Web part orientati agli strumenti (tool part) e ogni deve risiedere in un determinato tipo di zona strumenti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Tali parti nel set di controlli Web part presentano due caratteristiche distintive:-sono controlli di supporto che consentono agli utenti finali di personalizzare i controlli in una pagina Web part.

trans-unit.source: - They are visible only in certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: -Sono visibili solo in determinate modalità di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo BehaviorEditorPart fa parte dello strumento che diventa visibile solo quando una pagina Web part è in modalità di modifica e quando un oggetto specifico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo è stato selezionato per la modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo BehaviorEditorPart, come tutti gli altri <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli, si trova in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona può contenere solo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli non possono essere inseriti in qualsiasi altro tipo di zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The control is not displayed on the page under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo non viene visualizzato la pagina in determinate condizioni.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>sul valore della proprietà di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo in fase di modifica è `true`e la pagina è nell'ambito di personalizzazione utente (ovvero l'impostazione predefinita), il controllo non viene visualizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the BehaviorEditorPart control to be displayed in this scenario, typically you would need to follow two steps: - Add an entry to the Web.config file that gives an authorized user permission to edit Web pages in shared personalization scope (which means that the changes the user makes will be visible to all users of the application).
trans-unit.target: Per il controllo BehaviorEditorPart da visualizzare in questo scenario, in genere è necessario eseguire due passaggi:-aggiungere una voce al file Web. config che autorizza un utente autorizzato a modificare le pagine Web nell'ambito di personalizzazione condiviso (che significa che le modifiche apportate all'utente sarà visibile a tutti gli utenti dell'applicazione).

trans-unit.source: - Programmatically change the page from user-level to shared-level personalization scope at run time, for example by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Livello di codice modificare la pagina a livello di utente condiviso a livello di ambito di personalizzazione in fase di esecuzione, ad esempio utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to make the BehaviorEditorPart control visible in a page, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di come rendere visibile il controllo BehaviorEditorPart in una pagina, vedere la sezione esempio di questo argomento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about shared controls and personalization scope, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui controlli condivisi e ambito di personalizzazione, vedere [Panoramica sulla personalizzazione delle parti Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart class also has an important method, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: La classe BehaviorEditorPart ha anche un metodo importante, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, che eredita dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe ed esegue l'override.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited and assigning them to the fields of the editing control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo è fondamentale perché consente di ottenere i valori delle proprietà di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllare in fase di modifica e assegnarli ai campi del controllo di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the BehaviorEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:behavioreditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Nella maggior parte dei casi, il controllo BehaviorEditorPart deve essere utilizzato nel formato di persistenza pagina dichiarando un `<asp:behavioreditorpart>` elemento all'interno di un `<zonetemplate>` elemento, che a sua volta è contenuto in un `<asp:editorzone>` elemento in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo BehaviorEditorPart consente agli utenti di modificare le proprietà seguenti dell'interfaccia utente di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A>per modificare altre proprietà e comportamenti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, è possibile utilizzare gli altri <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli forniti con il set di controlli Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowZoneChange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowHide%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowConnect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ImportErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Description%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Questi controlli includono il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornito <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlli devono fornire la maggior parte delle funzionalità di modifica necessarie per modificare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>i controlli, ma è anche possibile creare un controllo editor personalizzato ereditando dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio di codice, vedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Cenni preliminari sulla classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the BehaviorEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per migliorare l'accessibilità, viene eseguito il rendering del controllo BehaviorEditorPart all'interno di un `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the BehaviorEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: Il `<fieldset>` elemento raggruppa il set correlato di controlli utilizzati per la modifica del controllo BehaviorEditorPart e facilita la navigazione a schede tra i controlli per gli agenti utente visivo (ad esempio i normali browser Web) e gli agenti utente di riconoscimento vocale (ad esempio un software di lettura dello schermo).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Accessibilità markup sottoposto a rendering per impostazione predefinita per questo controllo potrebbe non essere conforme agli standard di accessibilità, ad esempio le linee guida priorità 1 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG).

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate sul supporto di accessibilità per questo controllo, vedere [controlli ASP.NET e l'accessibilità](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe.

trans-unit.source: The BehaviorEditorPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore BehaviorEditorPart è predefinito. Nessun costruttore viene dichiarato nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>classe e pertanto non speciale attività vengono eseguite quando viene creata una nuova istanza della classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: In genere non occorre utilizzare il costruttore, poiché è possibile aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllo a una pagina in modo dichiarativo in fase di progettazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control programmatically for some reason, you can use the BehaviorEditorPart constructor.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se è necessario aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllo a livello di codice per qualche motivo, è possibile utilizzare il costruttore BehaviorEditorPart.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Salva i valori di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> controllo alle proprietà corrispondenti nell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ApplyChanges è di importanza critica in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Lo scopo del metodo consiste nel salvare i valori di un utente è impostato su un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllo alle proprietà corrispondenti nell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo associato viene fatto riferimento nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>ereditata del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set a number of user interface (UI)-related property values on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ApplyChanges tenta di impostare il numero di interfaccia utente (UI)-valori di proprietà sull'oggetto associato correlate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the property values that are set in this method, see the Remarks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco dei valori di proprietà che vengono impostate in questo metodo, vedere la sezione osservazioni nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>Cenni preliminari sulla classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks an OK verb or an apply verb in the editing UI.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ApplyChanges viene chiamato quando l'utente sceglie un verbo OK o Applica nell'interfaccia utente di modifica.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'azione di salvataggio dei valori di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> controllo il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo ha esito positivo; in caso contrario (se si verifica un errore), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un errore durante il tentativo di impostare il valore per una proprietà associata <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the default button on the control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'ID del pulsante predefinito sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultButton property overrides the base property to set several attributes on the property.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà DefaultButton esegue l'override della proprietà di base per impostare gli attributi diversi per la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The property cannot be used with themes, and it cannot be browsed with a design-time user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: La proprietà non può essere utilizzata con temi, e non può essere visualizzata con un'interfaccia utente in fase di progettazione (UI).

trans-unit.source: The value of the property is retrieved from the base property value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà viene recuperato dal valore della proprietà di base.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non può essere impostata da temi o temi di fogli di stile.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [ASP.NET temi e interfacce](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the default button.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'ID del pulsante predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se un controllo deve essere visualizzato quando l'identificatore associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo si trova nella modalità di modifica.

trans-unit.source: The Display property returns a value of `true`, meaning that the control will be displayed, except in one case.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di visualizzazione restituisce un valore di `true`, vale a dire che il controllo verrà visualizzato, tranne che in un caso.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> property value on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>sul valore della proprietà di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo in fase di modifica è `true`e la pagina è nell'ambito di personalizzazione utente (ovvero l'impostazione predefinita), il controllo non viene visualizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the steps required, and a code example that shows how to cause the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control to be displayed for editing, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> class overview and code example.
trans-unit.target: Per una spiegazione delle procedure necessarie e un esempio di codice che illustra come generare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllo da visualizzare per la modifica, vedere la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>classe panoramica e codice di esempio.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set is designed with the assumption that shared controls--controls that are visible to all users--should be visible for editing only when a page is in shared personalization scope, meaning that the editing changes are visible to all users.
trans-unit.target: Il set di controlli Web part è progettato partendo dal presupposto che controlli condivisi, ovvero i controlli che sono visibili a tutti gli utenti, deve essere visibile per la modifica solo quando una pagina è nell'ambito di personalizzazione condiviso, il che significa che la modifica le modifiche sono visibili a tutti gli utenti.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se il controllo deve essere visualizzato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera i valori di proprietà da un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllare e li assegna all'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SyncChanges è di importanza critica in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>metodo dalla classe di base, recupera i valori correnti da associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllare e aggiorna i controlli nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllo con tali valori in modo che un utente può modificarli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SyncChanges viene chiamato ogni volta che i valori associati <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo potrebbe essere state modificate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Per un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllo, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>area che contiene il controllo chiama il metodo SyncChanges, in modo che i valori di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllo sono sempre sincronizzate con i valori nell'oggetto associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un titolo per il controllo dell'editor.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà del titolo viene visualizzato nella barra del titolo di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>controllare quando il controllo è visibile in modalità di modifica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando il controllo viene dichiarato in una pagina, è possibile impostare un valore per il `Title` attributo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il titolo, un valore specifico delle impostazioni cultura predefinito viene utilizzato per descrivere le proprietà che questo controllo consente agli utenti di modificare.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che viene utilizzata come il titolo del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è un nome di controllo calcolato fornito dal set di controlli Web part.
